text: What do you mean by "reaches through i.e Artstation"? You mean submitting your work by sending an Artstation link?
There's work offers on Artstation,  so I was wondering if its better to pass through it or contact them directly through whatever means is offered instead of using the website(s) ?

Ah i didn't know that actually :slightly_smiling_face: . Yeah if they have offers on there it's probably a good idea to do it through that system...although i just checked it out and the postings i checked just link back to the company's recruiting portal outside of Artstation. So i guess in the end it doesn't matter/makes a difference in terms of reaching recruiters
It's cool to see that there are so many job offers on there, though - and from lots of big names in the industry (and different fields - games, tv, film) too!
